form.label: Incident Context
form.description: Details and context for a specific incident. Time Span is 7 day span surrounding event. Click a panel to display more information.

search.query: | makeresults count=0

done.eval: case('endpoint_event'=="t","eventtype=\"pan_endpoint\" client_ip=\"".'client_ip'."\" _time=\"".'event_time'."\"", 'network_event'=="t","eventtype=\"pan_firewall\" session_id=\"".'session_id'."\" serial_number=\"".'serial_number'."\" client_ip=\"".'client_ip'."\" server_ip=\"".'server_ip'."\"", 'aperture_event'=="t","eventtype=\"pan_aperture\" incident_id=\"".'incident_id'."\"", true(),"error1")

search.query: | makeresults | eval x="1,2,3,4" | makemv x delim="," | mvexpand x | eval label=case(x==1,"7 day span around incident", x==2,"30 days before incident", x==3,"60 days before incident", x==4,"All events since incident") | eval value=case(x==1,"302400s", x==2,"30d", x==3,"60d", x==4,"now") | eval etime=case(x==1,relative_time($event_time$,"-302400s"), x==2,relative_time($event_time$,"-30d"), x==3,relative_time($event_time$, "-60d"), x==4,$event_time$) | eval ltime=case(x==1,relative_time($event_time$,"+302400s"), x==2,$event_time$, x==3,$event_time$, x==4,now()) | table label value etime ltime

$index_match$ | head 5 | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS file_hash OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS file_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS url OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS url_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS dest_name OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS domain_autofocus_tags | eval autofocus_tags=mvappend(src_autofocus_tags,dest_autofocus_tags,file_autofocus_tags,url_autofocus_tags,domain_autofocus_tags) | stats values(log_subtype) AS "Log Subtypes" values(client_ip) AS "Client IP" values(server_ip) AS "Server IP" values(user) AS "Users" values(app) AS "Application" values(dest_name) AS "URL Hostname" values(http_category) AS "URL Category" values(threat_name) AS "Threat Name" values(threat_category) AS "Threat Category" values(file_name) AS "File Name" values(file_hash) AS "File Hash" values(verdict) AS "WildFire Verdict" values(autofocus_tags) AS "AutoFocus Tags" values(flags) AS "Session Properties" | append [| makeresults | eval map=mvappend("URL Hostname:URL Filtering","URL Category:URL Filtering","Threat Name:Threat Prevention","Threat Category:Threat Prevention","File Hash:WildFire","WildFire Verdict:WildFire","AutoFocus Tags:AutoFocus") | mvexpand map | rex field=map "^(?<headers>[^:]*):(?<values>.*)$" | xyseries _time headers values | fields - _time] | table "Log Subtypes" "Client IP" "Server IP" "Users" "Application" "URL Hostname" "URL Category" "Threat Name" "Threat Category" "File Name" "File Hash" "WildFire Verdict" "AutoFocus Tags" "Session Properties" | transpose | rename column AS Fields, "row 1" AS Values, "row 2" AS Source

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE (nodename="log.threat" OR nodename="log.wildfire.malicious") (log.client_ip="$client_ip$" log.server_ip="$server_ip$" log.session_id="$session_id$" log.serial_number="$serial_number$") GROUPBY log.src_ip log.log_subtype | rename log.* AS * | iplocation src_ip | geostats sum(count) by log_subtype

$index_match$ | head 5 | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS file_hash OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS file_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS url OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS url_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS dest_name OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS domain_autofocus_tags | eval autofocus_tags=mvappend(src_autofocus_tags,dest_autofocus_tags,file_autofocus_tags,url_autofocus_tags,domain_autofocus_tags) | stats values(log_subtype) AS "Log Subtypes" values(client_ip) AS "Client IP" values(user) AS "Users" values(threat_name) AS "Protection Module" values(file_name) AS "File Name" values(file_hash) AS "File Hash" values(autofocus_tags) AS "AutoFocus Tags" | table "Log Subtypes" "Client IP" "Users" "Protection Module" "File Name" "File Hash" "AutoFocus Tags" | transpose | rename column AS Fields, "row 1" AS Values

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_endpoint" WHERE nodename="log.attacks" log.client_ip="$client_ip$" GROUPBY _time log.log_subtype | rename log.* AS * | timechart sum(count) by log_subtype

eventtype="pan" session_id="$session_id$" serial_number="$serial_number$" client_ip="$client_ip$" server_ip="$server_ip$" | head 9 | eval time_in_seconds=_time | eval open_in=if(eventtype="pan_threat" OR (eventtype="pan_wildfire" AND verdict="malicious"),"Open in...",null()) | eval category=if(category=="any",null(),category) | table _time log_subtype user client_ip server_ip vendor_action direction file_name category open_in file_hash serial_number threat_id pcap_id host time_in_seconds
| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE log.$inc-ip_field$="$inc-ip$" GROUPBY log.app | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.threat" OR (nodename="log.wildfire" AND log.category!="benign") log.$inc-ip_field$="$inc-ip$" GROUPBY log.log_subtype | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count
| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.url" log.user=$inc-user|s$ GROUPBY log.dest_ip_name log.category | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.threat" OR (nodename="log.wildfire" AND log.category!="benign") log.user=$inc-user|s$ GROUPBY log.log_subtype | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count

panel.title: Possible Related Command And Control Traffic

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count, values(log.src_ip) as src, values(log.dest_ip) as dest FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.spyware" (log.src_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.src_ip="$server_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$server_ip$") GROUPBY _time span=4h log.threat_name | rename log.* AS * | eval matched=mvappend(if(src_ip=="$client_ip$" OR dest_ip=="$client_ip$","$client_ip$",null()),if(src_ip=="$server_ip$" OR dest_ip=="$server_ip$","$server_ip$",null())) | stats values(matched) AS matched, sparkline(sum(count), 4h) AS sparkline, sum(count) as count by threat_name | sort 100 -count

$index_match$ | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS client_ip OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS client_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS server_ip OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS server_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS file_hash OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS file_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS url OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS url_autofocus_tags | lookup minemeldfeeds_lookup indicator AS dest_name OUTPUT value.autofocus_tags AS domain_autofocus_tags | eval autofocus_tags=mvappend(client_autofocus_tags,server_autofocus_tags,file_autofocus_tags,url_autofocus_tags,domain_autofocus_tags) | search autofocus_tags=* | mvexpand autofocus_tags | lookup autofocus_tag_lookup aftag:public_tag_name AS autofocus_tags OUTPUT aftag:tag_class aftag:aliases aftag:tag_name aftag:tagstatus aftag:tag_groups.tag_group_name | search aftag:tagstatus="enable" | makemv delim=" " aftag:aliases | rename aftag:* AS * | stats values(aliases) AS aliases, values(tag_groups.tag_group_name) AS tag_group BY tag_name tag_class | table tag_name aliases tag_class tag_group
| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.url" log.src_ip="$victim_ip$" GROUPBY log.dest_ip_name log.category | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count

panel.title: Top NGFW Rules for IP Addresses

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count, values(log.src_ip) as src, values(log.dest_ip) as dest FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE log.src_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.src_ip="$server_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$server_ip$" GROUPBY _time span=4h log.rule log.action | rename log.* AS * | eval matched=mvappend(if(src=="$client_ip$" OR dest=="$client_ip$","$client_ip$",null()),if(src=="$server_ip$" OR dest=="$server_ip$","$server_ip$",null())) | stats values(matched) AS matched, values(action) AS actions, sparkline(sum(count), 4h) AS sparkline, sum(count) as count by rule | sort 100 -count

panel.title: Top NGFW Reporting Incidents For IP Addresses

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t values(log.dvc_host) AS log.dvc_host, values(log.src_ip) as src, values(log.dest_ip) as dest, count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE (nodename="log.threat" OR (nodename="log.wildfire" AND log.category!="benign")) (log.src_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.src_ip="$server_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$server_ip$") GROUPBY _time span=4h log.serial_number | rename log.* AS * | eval matched=mvappend(if(src=="$client_ip$" OR dest=="$client_ip$","$client_ip$",null()),if(src=="$server_ip$" OR dest=="$server_ip$","$server_ip$",null())) | eval dvc_host=coalesce(dvc_host,serial_number) | stats values(matched) AS matched, sparkline(sum(count), 4h) AS sparkline, sum(count) as count by dvc_host | sort 100 -count

| tstats summariesonly=t values(log.log_subtype) AS log.log_subtype, count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE (nodename="log.file" OR nodename="log.threat" OR nodename="log.wildfire") ((log.src_ip="$client_ip$" AND log.dest_ip="$server_ip$") OR (log.src_ip="$server_ip$" AND log.dest_ip="$client_ip$")) GROUPBY log.session_id log.src_ip_port log.dest_ip_port | rename log.* AS * | search log_subtype="file" OR log_subtype="wildfire" OR log_subtype="wildfire-virus" OR log_subtype="virus" | eval log_subtype=mvjoin(log_subtype, ":") | eval file_transfers=if(log_subtype=="file","Benign File Transfer","Malicious File Transfer") | stats sum(count) AS count by file_transfers | sort -count

| tstats summariesonly=t values(log.log_subtype) AS log.log_subtype, count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE (nodename="log.file" OR nodename="log.threat" OR nodename="log.wildfire") (log.src_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$client_ip$") GROUPBY log.session_id log.src_ip_port log.dest_ip_port | rename log.* AS * | search log_subtype="file" OR log_subtype="wildfire" OR log_subtype="wildfire-virus" OR log_subtype="virus" | eval log_subtype=mvjoin(log_subtype, ":") | eval file_transfers=if(log_subtype=="file","Benign File Transfer","Malicious File Transfer") | stats sum(count) AS count by file_transfers | sort -count

panel.title: Threats By Type Over Time For IP Addresses

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE (nodename="log.threat" OR (nodename="log.wildfire" AND log.category!="benign")) (log.src_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.src_ip="$server_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$server_ip$") GROUPBY _time log.log_subtype | rename log.* AS * | timechart sum(count) by log_subtype

| tstats summariesonly=t values(log.threat_name) AS log.threat_name, values(log.file_name) AS log.file_name, values(log.file_hash) AS log.file_hash, count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE (nodename="log.threat" OR (nodename="log.wildfire" AND log.category!="benign")) (log.src_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.src_ip="$server_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$server_ip$") GROUPBY _time span=1s log.serial_number log.user log.src_ip log.dest_ip log.log_subtype log.vendor_action log.pcap_id | rename log.* AS * | sort -_time
| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE log.$net-ip_field$="$net-ip$" GROUPBY log.app | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.threat" OR (nodename="log.wildfire" AND log.category!="benign") log.$net-ip_field$="$net-ip$" GROUPBY log.log_subtype | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count
| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.url" log.user=$net-user|s$ GROUPBY log.dest_ip_name log.category | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_firewall" WHERE nodename="log.threat" OR (nodename="log.wildfire" AND log.category!="benign") log.user=$net-user|s$ GROUPBY log.log_subtype | rename log.* AS * | sort 100 -count

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel="pan_endpoint" WHERE log.dest_ip="$client_ip$" OR log.dest_ip="$server_ip$" GROUPBY _time span=1s log.dest_ip log.log_subtype log.file_name log.file_hash log.action | rename log.* AS *
